AES

public AES(java.lang.Integer keySize)
    throws CryptoUtilsException
Constructor, sets the keySize to the AES algorithm

Parameters:
keySize - Size of the Key to use in the algotithm [128,192,256]
Throws:
CryptoUtilsException - If the key Size is different from [128,192,256]

Parameters:

alias - Alias to store the key
keyPassword - Password to protect the secretKey in the keystore

getKey

public byte[] getKey(java.security.KeyStore ks,
                     java.lang.String keyAlias,
                     java.lang.String keyPassword)
              throws CryptoUtilsException
Gets AES key from a KeyStore

Parameters:
keyStoreFileName - Name of the file in which the KeyStore is saved
keyStorePassword - Password for the KeyStore
keyAlias - KeyAlias
keyPassword - Password for the Key stored in the KeyStore
Returns:
The Key loaded from the keyStore
Throws:
CryptoUtilsException - If an error occurs during the key load this error MUST be handled

encrypt

public byte[] encrypt(byte[] input,
                      byte[] key,
                      byte[] iv,
                      java.lang.String operationMode,
                      java.lang.String padding)
               throws CryptoUtilsException
Encrypts a Text using the specified key with AES-[KeySize]

Parameters:
input - Plain Text to cipher
key - Key to use
iv - Initialization vector (16-byte array)
operationMode - Operation Mode to be used, check out supported operationModes
padding - Padding style to be used, check out supported paddings
Returns:
byte array containing the encrypted text
Throws:
CryptoUtilsException
